mapper.select: SELECT hfi.hfi_base_price AS base_price, hfi.hfi_cleaning_fee AS cleaning_fee, hfi.hfi_service_fee AS service_fee FROM house_fee_info hfi WHERE hfi.hfi_hi_seq = #{house_seq}

SELECT 1 AS cycle_no, hdo.hdo_seq AS option_seq, hdo.hdo_hi_seq AS house_seq, hdo.hdo_name AS option_name, hdo.hdo_rate AS option_rate, 0 AS option_day, hdo.hdo_enable_dt AS option_end_dt, hdo.hdo_enable AS enable FROM house_daily_option hdo WHERE house_seq = #{house_seq} AND enable !=0 AND option_end_dt >= date(now())

SELECT 2 AS cycle_no, hwo.hwo_seq AS option_seq, hwo.hwo_hi_seq AS house_seq, hwo.hwo_name AS option_name, hwo.hwo_rate AS option_rate, hwo.hwo_weekly AS option_day, hwo.hwo_enable_dt AS option_end_dt, hwo.hwo_enable AS enable FROM house_weekly_option hwo WHERE house_seq = #{house_seq} AND enable !=0 AND option_end_dt >= date(now())

SELECT 3 AS cycle_no, hmo.hmo_seq AS option_seq, hmo.hmo_hi_seq AS house_seq, hmo.hmo_name AS option_name, hmo.hmo_rate AS option_rate, hmo.hmo_monthly AS option_day, hmo.hmo_enable_dt AS option_end_dt, hmo.hmo_enable AS enable FROM house_monthly_option hmo WHERE house_seq = #{house_seq} AND enable !=0 AND option_end_dt >= date(now())

SELECT * FROM ( ( SELECT 1 AS cycle_no, hdo.hdo_seq AS option_seq, hdo.hdo_hi_seq AS house_seq, hdo.hdo_name AS option_name, hdo.hdo_rate AS option_rate, 0 AS option_day, hdo.hdo_enable_dt AS option_end_dt, hdo.hdo_enable AS enable FROM house_daily_option hdo ) UNION ALL( SELECT 2 AS cycle_no, hwo.hwo_seq AS option_seq, hwo.hwo_hi_seq AS house_seq, hwo.hwo_name AS option_name, hwo.hwo_rate AS option_rate, hwo.hwo_weekly AS option_day, hwo.hwo_enable_dt AS option_end_dt, hwo.hwo_enable AS enable FROM house_weekly_option hwo ) UNION ALL ( SELECT 3 AS cycle_no, hmo.hmo_seq AS option_seq, hmo.hmo_hi_seq AS house_seq, hmo.hmo_name AS option_name, hmo.hmo_rate AS option_rate, hmo.hmo_monthly AS option_day, hmo.hmo_enable_dt AS option_end_dt, hmo.hmo_enable AS enable FROM house_monthly_option hmo ) )opt WHERE house_seq = #{house_seq} AND enable !=0 AND option_end_dt >= date(now())
SELECT COUNT(*) AS booking FROM booking_info WHERE bi_hi_seq = #{house_seq} AND bi_status = 1 AND ( #{dt} BETWEEN date(bi_start_dt) AND date(bi_end_dt) )
